author: jonbuddy
title: A tiny Pull-Back Motor racer (4590)
review:
This set wasn't horrible, or I would have rated it a 1 or 2. It just was a impulse Drome Racers set that goes great with 4591-1: Star Strike so you have something equal in size and parts to race with. This concludes this very short review on 4590-1: Flash Turbo.

4591-1: Star Strike
http://brickset.com/detail/?Set=4591-1

jonbuddy

P.S. I own both 4590-1 and 4591-1.
